mapper.select:
#全程时效_日环比_周同比 select FORMAT(round(a.all_effect,2),2) effect, FORMAT(IFNULL((round(a.all_effect,2) - round(b.all_effect_lastday,2))/round(b.all_effect_lastday,2)*100,0),2) dayFrom, FORMAT(IFNULL((round(a.all_effect,2) - round(c.all_effect_lastweek,2))/round(c.all_effect_lastweek,2)*100,0),2) weekFrom from (select a.stats_dt, 0 as st, sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt) all_effect from bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.org_cd a.stats_dt = #{curDate}
GROUP BY 1 union all select 0,0,0 limit 1)a LEFT JOIN (select DATE_ADD(a.stats_dt,INTERVAL 1 DAY) stats_dt, 0 as st, sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt) all_effect_lastday from bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.org_cd a.stats_dt = DATE_SUB(#{curDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
GROUP BY 1 union all select 0,0,0 limit 1 ) b on a.st = b.st LEFT JOIN (select DATE_ADD(a.stats_dt,INTERVAL 1 WEEK) stats_dt, 0 as st, sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt) all_effect_lastweek from bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.org_cd a.stats_dt = DATE_SUB(#{curDate},INTERVAL 1 WEEK)
GROUP BY 1 union all select 0,0,0 limit 1 ) c on b.st = c.st

# 全程时效_日月周平均 select FORMAT(IFNULL(a.effect_All_last_day,0),2) last_day, FORMAT(IFNULL(b.effect_All_week_avg,0),2) week_avg, FORMAT(IFNULL(c.effect_All_month_avg,0),2) month_avg FROM (select stats_dt, 0 as st, sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt) effect_All_last_day from bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.org_cd a.stats_dt = DATE_SUB(#{curDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY)
GROUP BY 1 union all select 0,0,0 limit 1 ) a LEFT JOIN (SELECT 0 as st, DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(stats_dt,INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%X-%V') ymw, sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt) effect_All_week_avg FROM bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.org_cd a.stats_dt >= DATE_SUB(subdate(#{curDate},if(date_format(#{curDate},'%w')=0,7,date_format(#{curDate},'%w'))-1),INTERVAL 1 WEEK) and a.stats_dt <= DATE_SUB(subdate(#{curDate},if(date_format(#{curDate},'%w')=0,7,date_format(#{curDate},'%w'))-7),INTERVAL 1 WEEK)
GROUP BY ymw union all select 0,0,0 limit 1 ) b on a.st = b.st LEFT JOIN (SELECT date_format(a.stats_dt, '%Y-%m'), 0 as st, sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt) effect_All_month_avg FROM bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.org_cd
a.stats_dt >= date_format(#{curDate}, '%Y-%m-%01') AND a.stats_dt <= last_day(#{curDate})
GROUP BY 1 union all select 0,0,0 limit 1 ) c on b.st = c.st

SELECT a.ymd dateline, round(IFNULL(SUM(a.effect_All),0),2) active_val, round(IFNULL(SUM(b.effect_All_last_week),0),2) same_time_val FROM ( SELECT a.stats_dt ymd, sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt) AS effect_All FROM bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.org_cd
a.stats_dt > DATE_ADD(#{curDate}, INTERVAL - 15 DAY) AND a.stats_dt <= #{curDate}
GROUP BY ymd ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT date_add(a.stats_dt, INTERVAL 7 DAY) AS ymd, sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt) AS effect_All_last_week FROM bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.org_cd
a.stats_dt > date_add( DATE_ADD(#{curDate}, INTERVAL - 15 DAY), INTERVAL - 7 DAY ) AND a.stats_dt <= date_add(#{curDate}, INTERVAL - 7 DAY)
GROUP BY ymd ) b ON a.ymd = b.ymd GROUP BY 1

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(stats_dt,INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%X-%V') dateline, format(ifnull(round(sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt),2),0),2) as active_val, DATE_SUB(stats_dt,INTERVAL 1 WEEK) theDate from bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.Org_Cd
DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(stats_dt,INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%X-%V') BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(#{curDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY),INTERVAL 7 WEEK),'%X-%V') AND DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(#{curDate},INTERVAL 1 DAY),'%X-%V')
GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1

select a.ym dateline, CONCAT(a.ym,'-','01') theDate, format(round(a.effect_All_active,2),2) active_val, format(round(IFNULL(b.effect_All_sameDate,0),2),2) same_time_val from (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(stats_dt, '%Y-%m') ym, sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt) effect_All_active FROM ydbi.bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.Org_Cd
a.stats_dt >= DATE_SUB(date_format(#{curDate}, '%Y-%m-%01'),INTERVAL 5 MONTH) AND a.stats_dt <= last_day(#{curDate})
GROUP BY ym ) a LEFT JOIN (select DATE_ADD(a.ym,INTERVAL 1 YEAR) ym, a.effect_All_sameDate from ( SELECT DATE_FORMAT(stats_dt, '%Y-%m') ym, sum(a.all_effect*a.ship_cnt)/sum(a.ship_cnt) effect_All_sameDate FROM ydbi.bas_s_bigdata_effect_start a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.Org_Cd
a.stats_dt >= DATE_SUB(DATE_SUB(date_format(#{curDate}, '%Y-%m-%01'),INTERVAL 5 MONTH),INTERVAL 1 YEAR) AND a.stats_dt <= DATE_SUB(last_day(#{curDate}),INTERVAL 1 YEAR)
GROUP BY ym ) a ) b on a.ym = b.ym

select a.stats_dt, a.start_prov_id, a.ProvinceName_start, a.end_prov_id, a.ProvinceName_end, FORMAT(a.useTime,2) useTime, CASE WHEN @preRank = a.useTime THEN @curRank WHEN @preRank := a.useTime THEN @curRank := @curRank - 1 END AS rank from ( SELECT a.stats_dt, a.start_prov_id, b.ProvinceName ProvinceName_start, a.end_prov_id, p.ProvinceName ProvinceName_end, round(sum(a.all_len)/sum(a.ship_cnt),2) useTime FROM bas_s_bigdata_effect_prov a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.org_cd LEFT JOIN ydserver.province p on a.end_prov_id = p.ProvinceID LEFT JOIN ydserver.province b on a.start_prov_id = b.ProvinceID a.stats_dt = #{curDate}
GROUP BY 1,2,4 ORDER BY 6 desc LIMIT 10)a, (SELECT @curRank := 11, @preRank := NULL ) t ORDER BY a.useTime

SELECT d.start_city_id, d.end_city_id, d.CityName_start, d.CityName_end, format(round(d.useTime,2),2) useTime, CASE WHEN @preRank = useTime THEN @curRank WHEN @preRank := useTime THEN @curRank := @curRank - 1 END AS rank FROM ( SELECT b.start_city_id, b.end_city_id, b.cityName CityName_start, c.cityName CityName_end, b.useTime FROM ( SELECT a.stats_dt, a.start_city_id, a.end_city_id, a.useTime, b.cityName FROM ( SELECT a.stats_dt, a.start_city_id, a.end_city_id, # sum(a.trans_len) / sum(a.ship_cnt) useTime sum(a.all_len) / sum(a.ship_cnt) useTime FROM bas_s_bigdata_effect_city a INNER JOIN org_inf k ON a.dbct_site = k.org_cd a.stats_dt = #{curDate}
GROUP BY 1, 2, 3 ORDER BY 4 DESC LIMIT 10 ) a LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.CityID cityId, a.CityName cityName FROM ydserver.city a UNION SELECT b.CountyID cityId, b.CountyName cityName FROM ydserver.county b ) b ON a.start_city_id = b.cityId ) b LEFT JOIN ( SELECT a.CityID cityId, a.CityName cityName FROM ydserver.city a UNION SELECT b.CountyID cityId, b.CountyName cityName FROM ydserver.county b ) c ON b.end_city_id = c.cityId) d, ( SELECT @curRank := 11, @preRank := NULL ) t ORDER BY useTime +0
